name: Hair Salon
text: Getting ready for a big event, or just want to spruce up your look? Our full service salon located in the Galleria features excellent hair salon services including haircuts, hair coloring and highlighting, and a full service beauty salon for nails and makeup. Clients will relax in a warm, friendly salon where they are made to feel welcome and beautiful. Our salon is open to the public from Tuesday – Saturday, 9:00am-5:00pm.
